trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolf has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Cold damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.
